name: summer sun hat
notes:
the summer crochet sun hat from this pattern is a must have. 

using this raffia yarn along with the printable pdf pattern and follow along video tutorial, you'll have a gorgeous, packable and durable crochet sun hat for years to come. 

beginner friendly, stylish to wear, this crochet sun hat is perfect for everyone from beginner to crochet pro alike. 

it also makes for a fantastic crochet craft fair project to sell, as it is only 3 sizes to cover most everyone.

materials 
100% paper raffia yarn
3mm crochet hook
scissors
yarn needle
stitch marke

skill: easy

notes:
this pattern uses english ( us ) terminology 
this crochet sun hat pattern made as womenâ€™s sizes s( m, l )
in this picture i have demonstrated with size m

yarn needed: 230(245, 260) yards

gauge unblock: 18 sc x 18 rounds = 4"

sizes and measurements 
small: women smaller heads/teen = 19.55" hat circumference (fit 20-21" heads)
medium: fit most women heads = 21:33" hat circumference (fit 21-22" heads)
large: women larger heads = 23:11" hat circumference (fit 22-23.5" heads)
